contents:
白邦瑞最近出了本书，大义就是检讨对华政策，总体就是一句话，被中共骗了几十年，这里面，大概尤其需要表扬...

被中共骗了几十年，现在还是不停的给华为的许可证延期（已经第5次了），川统领的水平真是高~

U.S. Commerce Department extends Huawei license through May 15
https://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-huawei-tech/u-s-commerce-department-extends-huawei-license-through-may-15-idUSKBN20X32G

The Trump administration said on Tuesday it was extending a license allowing U.S. companies to continue doing business with China’s Huawei Technologies Co Ltd until May 15.

The U.S. Commerce Department has issued a series of extensions of the temporary license and had previously extended it until April 1. Huawei, the second-largest maker of smartphones, is also a major telecom equipment that provides 5G network technology.
